body:
## Expected Behavior
Two issues:

1) The TaskType Constraint itself should be optional. If it is not supplied, then we should assume that the intention is for both Activity and Workflow tasks to have the differing number of partitions.

2) We need to fix the code so that either "Activity/Workflow" or "1/2" work when it is explicitly set.

Exists on Temporal v1.1.1

comments.body: This has been fixed. The TaskType Constraint failure is in 1.2 (specify Activity or Workflow as TaskType) and making TaskType optional is landed to master and will be available on the next release.

title: DynamicConfig TaskQueuePartitions TaskType Constraint compares ENUM to a string/int, so it never matches
